name: Otaku Quiz - Anime Challenger
description:
Have you ever watched anime? sure often. But admit Wibu?
How about trying, want to challenge your ability to guess?
Who knows you are a true weasel.!
For now, Otaku Quiz has two Game Modes.

#CHARACTER QUIZ

This mode consists of several choices of chapters, and each chapter has 5 episodes, and each episode has 20 stages.
Each Character Stage is Random and you have to choose the answer A, B, C and D. If correct you will get 100 points.

#OP&ED QUIZ

Like the previous mode, it has several Chapters, Episodes and also 20 Stages. In this mode, the song will play randomly and you have to guess the Anime Title of this Song. The songs in question are Opening and Ending.

★Easy Gameplay

There's no such thing as Silhouettes, or blurry characters. So you just need to answer it. For OP&ED, the song that is playing will keep repeating until you finish answering.

★Permanent Game

The game will get updates for its Anime content. And also there is no Ads, nor do you have to pay for this or that item.

★Content Updates

In-game content will continue to be updated to a certain extent.
Like Guess the character, and guess the Opening and Ending.

Getting Missing DX8VB.DLL. Download game with name "Otaku Quiz Setup - Windows 1.0.0 .EXE" WARNING!
Some images may show a bikini or slightly revealing outfit.
NOTIFICATION!!
*Otaku Quiz does not collaborate with MyAnimelist and other products. Otaku Quiz is made for entertainment purposes only.
**All forms of Images, Names, Songs are from MyAnimelist. All forms of Illustration are from ZeroChan.
